EmailTemplate.subject: Quote - {!Quote.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, Please find the attached quote for the {!Quote.Project_Name__c} project per your request. We appreciate you thinking of RH Contract for this project!
So that we can best serve you, please return the signed quote including ship to address, contact name & phone number with payment per the terms noted on your quote. Defer to the last page of your quote for payment details and your preferred method of payment.
When sending checks via regular mail (USPS), please use the following addresses to submit payment:
For Regular Mail Check Payment (i.e First Class USPS), remit payment to: Restoration Hardware, Inc. Bank of America Lockbox Services PO BOX # 50081 Los Angeles, CA 90074 - 0081
***As a reminder, our address for sending Overnight/Courier/UPS/FedEx remains:
For Expedited Check Payment (i.e Overnight/Courier Services; UPS/FedEx) remit payment to: Bank of America Lockbox Services Lockbox LAC-50081 2706 Media Center Drive Los Angeles, CA 90065
Please do not hesitate to contact us should you have any questions.
Thank you,
{!User.FirstName}
